Body:
res = gp_minimize(bench3, [(-2.0, 2.0)], x0=[0.0], acq_func='LCB', n_calls=
    2, n_random_starts=0, random_state=1)
with tempfile.TemporaryFile() as f:
    dump(res, f)
    f.seek(0)
    res_loaded = load(f)
check_optimization_results_equality(res, res_loaded)
assert_true('func' in res_loaded.specs['args'])
with tempfile.TemporaryFile() as f:
    dump(res, f, store_objective=False)
    f.seek(0)
    res_loaded = load(f)
check_optimization_results_equality(res, res_loaded)
assert_true(not 'func' in res_loaded.specs['args'])
del res.specs['args']['func']
with tempfile.TemporaryFile() as f:
    dump(res, f, store_objective=False)
    f.seek(0)
    res_loaded = load(f)
check_optimization_results_equality(res, res_loaded)
assert_true(not 'func' in res_loaded.specs['args'])
pytest.mark.fast_test
